resources.string: Envobyte Note is a clean and minimal note-taking app that helps you capture your thoughts instantly. Create, edit, search, and organize your notes with ease. Mark your favorites, switch between light and dark themes, and enjoy a distraction-free writing experience.

1. Tap “+” to create a new note.
2. Add a title and description for your note.
3. Use the segmented buttons at the top to switch between All Notes and Favorites.
4. Tap the ❤️ icon to favorite important notes.
5. Enable Dark Mode for a comfortable night-time writing experience.
6. Edit or delete notes anytime with just one tap.

Envobyte is a dynamic IT company specializing in custom web and mobile app development, digital marketing, and branding services. Founded in 2015 and headquartered in Khulna, Bangladesh, Envobyte has grown into a global digital solutions provider, serving clients across North America, Europe, and beyond.
